<!-- COPY DOCS -->
<!-- ./thirdpartyemailpassword/remix/remix-integration-overview.mdx -->

Integrating SuperTokens with a Remix application involves:

- Calling the SuperTokens initialization function, passing the frontend and backend configuration settings.
- Creating a frontend route to handle authentication-related routes (at `app/routes/auth/` by default).
- Integrating the SuperTokens login UI and protecting frontend routes in `root.tsx`.
- Exposing the authentication APIs consumed by the frontend widgets (at `app/routes/api/auth/` by default).

## Final `app` Folder Structure

Below is an example folder structure for the `app` folder after completing the steps in this integration guide:
